email_response.subject: Re: OPPORTUNITY: Satellite Upgrade technicians needed in Atlanta
email_response.body:
Hello!

Thank you for considering me for the satellite upgrade project. I'm very excited about this opportunity!

Equipment confirmation:
✓ Bucket truck - International CV with Terex HiRanger
✓ Spectrum analyzer - Keysight N9320B
✓ Full complement of hand tools and safety equipment

I'm BICSI certified and also hold CompTIA Network+ certification. I've completed over 200 satellite installation and upgrade jobs with a 4.9 star rating.

I'm absolutely willing to travel throughout the Atlanta area. I'm attaching my insurance certificate - it's $3M coverage through Liberty Mutual, valid until September 2027.

Ready to start immediately!

Best,
Lisa Chen
Tech Elite Solutions
(678) 555-0198
